faq.question: What are your business hours?
faq.answer: We're open Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturdays from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM. We're closed on Sundays and major holidays.

faq.question: Do you offer emergency services?
faq.description: Yes, we provide 24/7 emergency support for premium customers. Regular customers can contact us during business hours.

faq.question: How can I book an appointment?
faq.answer: You can book an appointment by calling us at +1-800-SUPPORT, emailing support@yourbusiness.com, or visiting our website at https://yourbusiness.com/booking

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, cash, and bank transfers. We also offer payment plans for services over $200.

faq.question: Do you provide free estimates?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide free estimates for all our services. You can request an estimate by calling us or filling out the form on our website.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: We require 24 hours notice for cancellations. Late cancellations may incur a $25 fee. Emergency situations are handled case-by-case.

faq.question: Do you offer warranties on your services?
faq.answer: Yes, all our services come with a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. Premium services include extended warranties up to 90 days.

faq.question: Can you work on weekends?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer weekend appointments from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM on Saturdays. We also have weekend special pricing available.

faq.question: How far do you travel for service calls?
faq.answer: We service within a 50-mile radius of our main office. Additional travel fees may apply for locations beyond 25 miles.

faq.question: Do you offer maintenance packages?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer monthly, quarterly, and annual maintenance packages. These include regular check-ups and priority scheduling.
